text: "The Stranger" is a 1978 song by Billy Joel and is the title track from his fifth studio album of the same name. It went to number 2 in Japan, number 8 in New Zealand and number 59 in Australia and France. It was not released in the United Kingdom, the United States, Canada and Ireland. ==Track listing== ===7" vinyl (CBS)=== # "The Stranger" # "Just the Way You Are" ===Japanese 7" vinyl=== # "The Stranger" [4:10] # "Movin' Out (Anthony's Song)" [3:30] ==References== Category:1978 songs Category:Billy Joel songs Category:Funk rock songs
title: The Stranger (song)
